name: Terraformer
uniques: Turn this tile into a [Tundra] tile <in [Snow] tiles> <by consuming this unit>
Turn this tile into a [Snow] tile <in [Tundra] tiles> <by consuming this unit>
Turn this tile into a [Grassland] tile <in [Tundra] tiles> <by consuming this unit>
Turn this tile into a [Plains] tile <in [Grassland] tiles> <by consuming this unit>
Turn this tile into a [Grassland] tile <in [Plains] tiles> <by consuming this unit
Turn this tile into a [Tundra] tile <in [Grassland] tiles> <by consuming this unit>
Turn this tile into a [Plains] tile <in [Desert] tiles> <by consuming this unit>
Turn this tile into a [Desert] tile <in [Plains] tiles> <by consuming this unit>
quote: Un travailleur capable de terraformer son environnement !

name: Seedler.
uniques: Turn this tile into a [Forest] tile <in [Grassland] tiles> <by consuming this unit
Turn this tile into a [Forest] tile <in [Plains] tiles> <by consuming this unit>
Turn this tile into [Forest] tile <in [Tundra] tiles> <by consuming this unit>
Turn this tile into a [Forest] tile <in [Hill] tiles> <by consuming this unit>
Turn this tile into a [Forest] tile <in [Plains] tiles> <by consuming this unit>
Turn this tile into a [Jungle] tile <in [Grassland] tiles> <by consuming this unit>
Turn this tile into a [Jungle] tile <in [Plains] tiles> <by consuming this unit>
quote: Un expert paysagiste capable de replanter des forêts et des jungles !.

name: Entrepreneur
uniques: Unbuildable
uniques.quote: Une personne ordinaire, qui souhaite créer des entreprises pour s'enrichir et pour enrichir sa patrie. Peut être que dans 100ans on se souviendra d'elle et de ses entreprises !

uniques.name: Animal lover Tourist
uniques: Consumes [1] [Cattle]
Consumes [1] [Deer]
Consumes [1] [Sheep]
Gain [11] [Gold] <every [3] turns>
uniques.quote: Un gars, possé là, qui vie pour sa passion des animaux et consomme des trucs qui servent à rien contre de l'or

uniques.name: Natural lover Tourist
uniques: [0]% maintenance costs
Consumes [1] [Bananas]
Consumes [1] [Wheat]
Gain [5] [Gold] <every [2] turns>
uniques.quote: Un gars, possé là, qui vie pour sa passion de la nature et consomme des trucs qui servent à rien contre de l'or

uniques.name: Adevnture lover Tourist
uniques: [0]% maintenance costs
Consumes [1] [Fish]
Consumes [1] [Stone]
Gain [2] [Gold] <every [1] turns>
uniques.quote: Un gars, possé là, qui vie pour sa passion de l'aventure et consomme des trucs qui servent à rien contre de l'or

uniques.name: Médecin
uniques: [0]% maintenance costs
Consumes [1] [Horses]
All adjacent units heal [20] HP when healing
uniques.quote: Dans une guerre, le camp avec le plus de blessé est celui qui a le plus de chance de perdre. Donc ce bonhomme est un renfort essentiel sur le terrain

uniques.name: Skilled Worker
uniques: Can build [Land] improvements on tiles
Can build [All Road] improvements at a [25]% rate
Can build [Land] improvements at a [50]% rate
Automation is a primary action
uniques.quote: Un ouvrier c'est bien, un ouvrier qualifié c'est mieux !

uniques.name: Diplomate
uniques: Can undertake a trade mission with City-State, giving a large sum of gold and [10] Influence <by consuming this unit>
May enter foreign tiles without open borders <when not at war>
uniques.quote: Entretenir de bonnes relations avec les cités états est important, donc il faut des diplomate !
